title: Interpretation of a tiger in a dream: Seeing a lioness in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the tiger and the leopard in a dream, for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, if the predators bite and they run away chasing me. Or not: Interpretation of the tiger in a dream Generally, seeing a tiger has many meanings. It can refer to a harsh boss, powerful men, and enemies who bring you evil and hatred. Whoever sees a tiger indicates that there is an enemy who will defeat the seer and betray him. Whoever sees himself marrying a tiger, this indicates that he will impose his control over a corrupt woman out of line. Seeing a tiger can also indicate illness and fatigue. Whoever sees a big or small tiger indicates that he will be a successful person in his work and will constantly develop at this level. A live tiger in a dream indicates strength and success in pursuit and work. A tiger imprisoned or captive in a cage or zoo indicates an imminent danger resulting from mismanagement or thinking. If you dream of a wild tiger attacking or attacking you, this is a sign of danger to you, if you manage to escape because your problems and concerns will disappear, but if your tiger takes control and is able to throw you to the ground, this is a sign of failure and the beginning of problems. Interpretation of a tiger in a single dream A tiger in a single dream is a strong and powerful young man and is a sign of good luck in marriage or engagement. The skin of a tiger in a dream indicates a dowry. A tiger attacks a girl in her dream, a large number of fans appear to her. An unmarried woman caresses a tiger , or strokes it or kisses it as if it were a cat, she is happy to meet a member of her family, and this may be a sign of her marriage. Interpretation of a tiger in a married woman's dream indicates the strength of the relationship and marital and family ties. It is a sign of luck in money and livelihood. A married woman who sees a calm and obedient tame tiger in her house as if she lives with her enjoys an excellent marital relationship and enjoys great love from her husband. As for the married woman who caresses the tiger and hugs or kisses it, she is pregnant. Interpretation of a tiger in a pregnant woman's dream The tiger in a pregnant woman's dream indicates a male child. A pregnant woman who sees in her dream that there is a tiger in her house is happy with more care, love and attention from her husband. Seeing a tiger in a woman's dream in general. Whoever sees a tiger in her dream indicates that her husband is nervous and unjust and does not give her the simplest rights. Seeing a tiger for a woman indicates the breadwinner and father and the most important features of injustice and cruelty. A patient who sees a tiger in a dream indicates that her death is approaching. If he sees that he is fighting a tiger, this indicates that he will defeat the disease and recover. Whoever sees a lioness in a dream interprets the presence of an unjust woman outside the path of truth. It helps the dreamer to commit forbidden acts and intends to harm her. Whoever sees that he is fighting a lioness, this indicates that there is a woman conspiring against him, but the dreamer will defeat her in the end. Interpretation of a tame tiger in a dream Whoever sees in his dream that he buys a tiger and houses it in his house or home, he enjoys the friendship of influential and honorable people such as ministers, princes, kings, rulers and presidents. The tame tiger, which he caresses, shows that the problems will go away, and kissing it shows friendliness and good communication. Whoever sees in her dream that she is sleeping with a tiger in her bed or on her bed, then

title: Interpretation of a dream about buying chicken feed in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about buying chicken feed in a dream. Some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about buying chicken feed in a dream. It is one of the dreams that some people see, but there are many interpretations that the site explains, as it lists the interpretations of some diligent scholars seeking to reach the truth. Interpretation of a dream about buying chicken feed in Dream: Buying chicken feed in a dream may indicate his need for a helping hand to overcome a difficult stage in his life during this time, and God knows best. If you see in a dream buying animal feed, this may indicate new changes that may occur to the dreamer in his life during this period, thanks to God. If one sees that he is buying chicken feed in a dream, this may mean that he feels very anxious during this time, and God knows best. Seeing that he is buying chicken feed in a dream may indicate that there are serious people in the dreamer’s life who help him get rid of life’s problems, thanks to God. Interpretation Dreaming of dry feed in a dream: Taking dry feed in a dream may indicate some obstacles that the dreamer may face in his life during this time, and God knows best. If there is a vision of buying chicken feed in a dream, this may indicate good changes that will occur to the dreamer in his life during This time is by the grace of God. Seeing eating animal fodder in a dream may indicate diseases that may affect one’s vision, and God knows best. Seeing storing dry fodder in a dream may indicate distance from the material obstacles that the dreamer may face during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the dead They give fodder to the living in a dream. Seeing a dead person giving food to the living in a dream may indicate good things that may come to the dreamer during those days, thanks to God. Seeing taking fodder from the dead in a dream can indicate positive changes that may happen to the dreamer in his life during this time. And God knows best. It is possible that the vision of taking fodder from the dead in a dream indicates the good changes that will occur to the vision, or the ability to satisfy desires and dreams, and God knows best. It is possible that the vision of receiving fodder from the dead in a dream indicates many good things that The dreamer can achieve it in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about sifting flour in a dream: Seeing a flour sieve in a dream may indicate the abundance of money that the dreamer may acquire in his life during this time, thanks to God. In the event that one sees flour Sifted in a dream, this may indicate wrong words received by the dreamer and his family and he must ask for God’s help. Seeing a fine sieve in a dream may indicate losing money in a bad market during this time, and God knows best. Seeing a fine sieve in a dream could indicate Bad events may happen to the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about harvesting barley in a dream Collecting barley in a dream may indicate material gains that the dreamer may obtain in his life during this time, and God knows best. If a person sees that he is collecting barley in a dream, This may indicate material gains

title: Interpretation of acne in a dream Seeing pimples on the face in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of pills for the single, married, pregnant and divorced girl, for the married and unmarried man: red and black on the body, neck, chest, back, and on stretch marks. I dreamed that my face had pills and more from Ibn Sirin. Pills in a dream are one of the dreams that often haunt us in our dreams and have many different shapes and meanings. Seeing pimples on the body or face in a dream is one of the puzzling visions for its owner and causes anxiety for the dreamer himself, so today we will present to you the interpretation of seeing pimples in a dream, for a married and pregnant woman. A woman, and also for one girl. Interpretation of a dream about birth control pills on the face. If the dreamer sees in a dream that there are pimples on his face and they burst and pus comes out of them, then this indicates victory and victory. If the pimples that appear on the face are smallpox, it means heaviness and doubling of money. If the dreamer sees pimples on his face that suddenly appeared, this indicates the fears that he may suffer from. If the grains sink in a dream and do not stain clothes, this indicates the removal of worries and the dreamer will gain well. When the dreamer sees that the grains explode on his face and a liquid comes out of it, this indicates his victory in a matter he completes. If wheat in a dream resembles smallpox, this is a sign of heavy and inexhaustible wealth. If the dreamer sees grains in a dream that suddenly appeared on his face, this is a sign of anxiety from which he will suddenly suffer. If he sees pimples on his face, but they do not open and become infected, then this dream will reflect good benefits and fears that will go away. Whoever eats in a dream what pus comes out of acne, this is evidence that he eats forbidden and forbidden things, and poverty comes after wealth. In the event that the dreamer sees in a dream That the acne grew on his back and disappeared, then this is evidence that he was carrying great anxiety and will leave. If there is blood or pus in the solution of the acne, it means that the person will speak badly and condemn himself. Whoever is kind and sees acne on his body in the dream, this Evidence that he is doing good things in his life. Whoever removes acne will keep his problems away. If a person is evil, then acne on his body is evidence of problems. On the other hand, if blood and pus flow from the pimples, this means debt to the dreamer and bad words that he will hear. If pus comes out of Wheat and the dreamer eating it, this means that he will eat forbidden money and poverty after getting rich. If the pimples appear on the man’s back and then disappear, this indicates, uh, that he was feeling very anxious and they disappeared. Seeing acne in a dream indicates getting rid of problems and crises in the near future, and receiving good news, Overcoming events that lead to creating problems, and ending a difficult situation that has lasted a long time. His life will be abundant and blessed and he will achieve many successes with the right decisions. Squeezing acne in a dream Thanks to the support that a relative will give to this person, he will achieve what he wants in life, he will become a tolerant and respectable person, he will surpass all his competitors, and his name will be written in golden letters by the company that He works on it and has begun, and he will be a man

title: Interpretation of a snake bite in a dream: Seeing a snake bite in a dream

preview.html: We deal with seeing a live bite of a single, married and pregnant girl, whether on the arm, leg, neck, left or right leg, and small and large snakes in black, yellow and white that Ibn Sirin bit me. A snake bite in a dream is one of the most frightening and frightening dreams that we often see in a dream that strikes the dreamer with fear. The horror is caused by a snake bite, as the snake is one of the most hostile creatures to humans, which begins to attack a person if he is in the same place, and exposure to its bite for life can cause instant death if it is exposed to poison. Imam Ibn Sirin, the world-famous dream interpreter, explained seeing a snake bite in a dream. , with many meanings and clues that reach the dreamer, which carries with us many meanings and clues for us according to the vision. Interpretation of a snake bite in a dream: Seeing a snake bite in a dream indicates that a dream about a snake bite symbolizes the presence of a certain danger, as the subconscious sends a warning siren to inform us of the difficulties that arise. We may encounter it. But know that a dream about snake bites does not always indicate a difficult situation, rather it can be an interpretation of our fear of reptiles. A black snake bite symbolizes a personality flaw that cannot be eliminated, so the subconscious uses this trick in an attempt to get rid of harassment. Conflicting. The yellow snake bite. The yellow color in a dream symbolizes physical and psychological fatigue and illness, so the subconscious mind sends a message demanding attention to your health, that is, following a proper diet and exercising, in addition to maintaining it. Calm down and reduce mental fatigue. A snake bite on the head may mean that you may suffer from a psychological or social crisis that cannot be eliminated. This dream is a warning against dealing with negative thoughts in life that hinder progress, so it invites you to check your calculations. A snake bite on the leg symbolizes A person's insistence on making progress in his career and seeking financial gain, but in a way that is unfounded! Therefore, this dream prompts a review of work and daily affairs to find out what is wrong. Interpretation of a snake bite in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees that a snake attacks and bites her in a dream, this is evidence that she will fall into great prohibitions. A snake that bites a girl in a dream indicates Indicating that she will willingly practice immorality and adultery. If an unmarried woman sees that a snake has bitten her leg and does not harm her, this indicates that she will commit adultery. Seeing a girl bitten by a snake twice in a dream is evidence that God will stand by her side to overcome her problems. Seeing an unmarried woman Killing a snake in a dream is evidence that she is a good and religious girl. Seeing a black snake girl in a dream is evidence of the need to review herself in life with regard to emotional relationships. Seeing a girl wrapping a snake around her neck in a dream is evidence that she will be hurt in life. Interpretation of a snake bite in a dream For a married woman: If a married woman sees that there is a snake biting her leg

title: Interpretation of a toilet in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Today, dear reader, we present to you the topic of interpreting the toilet in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. The toilet is part of the bathroom that a person goes to to relieve himself or take a shower. It is known that the toilet is the house of evil and evil, which is why some people feel terrified when they see themselves in the bathroom or toilet, and the bathroom or toilet in life is called the house of comfort because a person gets rid of the waste that surrounds him and causes him pain, which if left in his body causes him harm and the need to urinate or defecate is a feeling that causes a person distress and pain if he does not empty himself. contained in his stomach. In a dream, the vision of individuals varies between standing in the bathroom for no reason, or sitting in it, or relaxing or taking a shower. To know more about the meaning of seeing a toilet in a dream, you should stay with us in the Encyclopedia. Interpretation of the toilet in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq The dream of the fortuneteller being in the bathroom is an indication of a state of comfort after hardship. It indicates purifying the soul from sins and transgressions and purifying impurity. Seeing the toilet is generally unpleasant, unless the dreamer is removing garbage or taking a shower. However, if he sees that feces are stuck to his clothes, this is evidence of bad news he hears or a shameful accusation that he did not commit; because feces and urine are among the things that cause a bad smell that repels people from them. Those. It also indicates that if he enters the bathroom to wash, he is absolved of sins and transgressions and returns in repentance to God Almighty; because washing is ridding the body of the dirt that has stuck, whether in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about falling into the toilet Falling into the toilet in a dream is considered one of the hated dreams that do not bode well, so when you see it, you should not tell anyone about your vision and spit to your left three times as the Messenger (may God bless him and grant him peace) commanded us. And he promised those who do that that their visions will not come true on the ground and will not be harmed by it, God Almighty willing. Interpretation of a dream about a toilet A dream about a dirty bathroom or toilet is evidence of gossip and bad words that are said about the dreamer in reality. And a single woman’s dream of entering a dirty bathroom indicates that she is doing something forbidden for her to leave it. As for a man’s dream of entering a dirty bathroom, this is evidence of his many desires that he must repent of. But if he sees that one of his friends or relatives enters a dirty bathroom, this is an indication that this person will cause a lot of trouble for the fortune teller, and he must be warned and not trust him too much. Interpretation of a dream about a clean toilet A clean bathroom is an indication of comfort and getting rid of burdens. And a girl entering a clean bathroom or cleaning it is evidence of her purity and good spirit. As for a man, if he sees that he is the one cleaning and perfuming the bathroom, this is good news for him in trade and profit in his work. And the dream of someone who entered a clean bathroom and took a bath in it is evidence of his purity from sins, his distance from sins, and his repentance for them. Interpretation of a dream about clothes falling in the toilet Clothes falling in the bathroom is considered An undesirable dream indicating harm to its owner through discord, ambiguity, or spreading rumors about him, so her opinion should be

title: Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream. In fact, good and good dreams and visions abound in the dreamer’s dream. And gifts and blessings, and this is what interpretation scholars have come up with, and some may search for an interpretation of the dream of reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream, and this is what will be presented in this article. Interpretation of the dream of reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream by Ibn SirinThere is no doubt that Ibn Sirin is considered one of the most prominent and famous of those who provided interpretations. And accurate and correct interpretations, and we will learn about Ibn Sirin’s views on this vision as follows: In general, Ibn Sirin believes that this vision for all social situations is a sign of staying away from all transgressions and sins. title: Learn about the interpretation of eating beans in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Eating beans in a dream is one of the visions that carry many different meanings and interpretations in the dreamer’s life, depending on the dreamer’s condition and what he saw in the dream, as beans are a popular and famous meal that many people prefer. Dreaming that eating beans in a dream could indicate good interpretations or Unpleasant, so let's get acquainted with all the interpretations of this vision. Eating beans in a dreamEating beans in a dream raw and uncooked, this is evidence of many fears and problems in the dreamer's life. If someone sees that he is eating beans and is not happy with it, this is a sign of difficulties and problems Which he faces in his life and in his relationship with those around him in reality. If you see yourself eating beans in a dream, this may indicate a lack of money and a misfortune that will befall the dreamer. If a merchant sees that he is eating a lot of beans, this is a sign of loss in his trade or lack of profit. If he eats Beans in a dream is a sign of goodness and blessing in the dreamer’s life. If a man sees in a dream that he is eating beans, this is evidence of the happy life and comfortable life that the dreamer lives in his reality. If he eats cooked beans in a dream and enjoys them, this is a sign of good news that he will hear The dreamer soon. But if the dreamer sees in a dream a bowl of beans filled to the brim until the beans fall to the ground, this indicates goodness and money that will come to the dreamer in reality. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is buying cooked beans, this is a sign of halal money and good nutrition. Buying dry beans in a dream can mean trouble and distress that will happen to the dreamer. Eating beans in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing beans in general in a dream indicates a lot of money that a person has and makes him feel reassured. It is also an indication of the birth of good and fair males for the father and mother later on. Eating beans in a dream can indicate a stable financial situation and working in a profession that has a high status. However, if the beans in the dream are dry and not ripe and cause harm to the pioneer, this means that the dreamer will go through some crises and problems in his life at the present time, either due to lack of money Or not finding a job that suits him. Perhaps the vision indicates the dispersion of the family due to the husband’s separation from his wife. The specialized online dream interpretation website features a selection of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type online dream interpretation site on Google. Eating beans in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is eating beans, this indicates her marriage and the approaching date of her engagement to a good man. If an unmarried woman receives a gift from eating boiled beans, this is a sign of Comfort and joy in this dreamer's life. Dry beans in a dream may indicate difficulties and problems that the girl will face in her life. Seeing women alone in a dream that they are eating dry beans is evidence of problems at work and in a relationship with

title: 55 of the secrets of interpreting travel in a dream, for good and evil and in different situations

preview.html: We present to you, dear reader, an encyclopedia of interpretations of travel in a dream. It is one of the visions that seeing it is not far from any of us. Rather, it is one of the dreams that many people see in their wakefulness, whether they want to travel to a foreign country to obtain work or treatment, as a reason for that. The desire may be for tourism or to gain knowledge, and most Muslims want to travel to perform the Hajj. Since travel is one of the common topics that are mentioned in the human mind and thought, seeing it in a dream has consequences that are often linked to the reality of the dreamer and closely linked to it, but in At the same time, it could just be dreams and a visual translation of the ideas the dreamer is thinking about in his life, and therefore we will show you the most prominent interpretations related to the vision. Travel in a dream for single, married and pregnant women and travel to foreign countries in the following paragraphs. Interpretation of travel in a dream and in the next paragraph we present to you what Ibn Sirin mentioned it in seeing travel in a dream: Traveling from one place to another in a dream indicates the dreamer’s transition from one situation to another that is better than this, whether it is a personal life or related to his work and the success he seeks to achieve. The dreamer seeing that he has the opportunity to travel and he is very happy. Therefore, it is a sign that he hears news that pleases him and brings joy to his heart. Whoever is sick and sees himself traveling by car in a dream, this is good news of a complete and speedy recovery, by God’s will. While traveling on foot without being able to reach his destination symbolizes his suffering from problems and worries that It is often caused by the accumulation of debts on him. While the dreamer’s book indicates a place whose destination is unknown due to the severity of his illness and pain, this vision is not considered one of the good visions for him, and God knows best. Preparing to travel in a dream is seeing preparations for the trip by preparing bags or carrying special paper for them. A different meaning than the idea of ​​a trip in reality, which we will explain in the following points: Preparing for the trip indicates that the dreamer is struggling to achieve his goals, and it also indicates that he is looking for a suitable job opportunity and will find it by God’s will. This dream indicates that the dreamer is ready to get married soon. Interpretation of a dream Traveling to a foreign country: This dream indicates that the dreamer’s dreams will come true soon, and this depends on the country in which the sleeper sees himself traveling, the interpretation of which we will provide in the following paragraph: The dreamer’s trip to America indicates that he will marry a woman of wealthy birth, and indicates that he will receive a promotion in Work and he will soon reach a prestigious position, through which he will achieve many successes. While the vision of traveling to France is not considered a praiseworthy vision, rather it portends the appearance of disturbing things for the dreamer, as it indicates that he is suffering from a lot of sorrows and worries, and traveling to France is an attempt to get rid of Of which. These problems. Interpretation of dreams about traveling by plane: The plane is considered one of the most important means of transportation that helps people move from one place to another and from one country to another easily and in a short time. When the sleeper sees that he is traveling by plane in a dream, the interpretation of that is this.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a pigeon in a dreamEveryone wants to learn the interpretation of seeing a pigeon in a dream, and since commentators differ in their opinions about seeing a pigeon, many people search for it on the Internet. Interpretation of seeing a pigeon in a dream by Ibn SirinYou can find out all the different interpretations of dreams and all the interpreters on the different website.It is believed that seeing a pigeon in a dream for a sad person indicates the end of his sadness. Whoever sees a pigeon flying around him or standing on him, the immigrant will return to him. He also saw that seeing a pigeon in a dream can indicate the birth of a girl in the family. But seeing a bird swooping on the dreamer in a dream may mean that his destruction and death are approaching. As for whoever sees a pigeon in a dream that belongs to someone else, this indicates that this person committed adultery, and seeing someone feeding pigeons in a dream may mean that this person is a pimp. He also saw that whoever knows that the pigeon is not his and feeds it in a dream and scatters fodder on it, this indicates that the dreamer is an adulterer or a pimp. As for whoever sees a pigeon moving away from him and does not approach again, this may indicate the death of his wife or that he will divorce her in the future. He also saw that Whoever cuts off a dove's wing in a dream indicates that the dreamer's freedom is limited to his wife and the continuation of his quarrel with her and her harsh violence. If a married woman sees a dove, this may indicate that she will become pregnant, and if she is pregnant, she will give birth soon. Interpretation of a dream about a dove by Nabulsi The interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream is one of the best interpretations provided by Nabulsi. He saw that the dove, especially the white one, indicates the response to prayers and the fulfillment of what he has always wished for. If the dreamer sees the dove in his house, this indicates the marriage of an unmarried person from the residents of that house. The dove in a dream can also indicate, according to its interpretation, the dreamer's wife, how pure and chaste she is, her personality is good and her appearance is good. As for the one who sees a dove jumping on him, something good will happen to him and a happy and joyful event will happen to him. Interpretation of a dream about a dove by Ibn Shaheen This interpreter says in his interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream that it may indicate a beautiful and beautiful woman and also says that catching a dove in a dream may indicate adultery with a woman. However, if the dreamer sees a dove standing on his head, shoulder or neck, this may indicate His vision of his actions that were done throughout his life, whether good or bad. If the dove has a good appearance, its actions are good and good, such as the shape of the dove, and if the dove has a bad shape, its actions are ugly and bad. Ibn Shaheen sees that the best and most beautiful types of doves in a dream are green doves. He also saw that buying a dove in a dream or giving him one of the doves as a gift indicates the good that will happen to the dreamer, but from afar he may travel abroad, for example, for work or marriage. As for the pigeon chicks in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will suffer from sorrows from women, such as his wife, sister or mother, and children as brothers or sons of the dreamer. He also saw that playing with the dove is unpleasant, and indicates engaging in something useless, and playing with the dove can also indicate the

This interpreter says in his interpretation of seeing a dove in a dream that it may indicate a beautiful and beautiful woman. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a Sidr tree in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Sidr in a dream, interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream, interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi, interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream. A dream by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of seeing a sidr tree in a dream by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of seeing a sidr tree in a dream by Al-Nabulsi, interpretation of seeing a sidr tree in a dream, seeing a sidr tree in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, learn more on the Mozat website. (Sunflowers in a dream) Interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In this paragraph we talk about the interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream and a dream by Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of a dream about a Sidr tree, and the interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream. A dream about a Sidr tree, Interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream and a dream by Ibn Sirin, Interpretation of a dream about a Sidr tree, Interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream and a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Interpretation of seeing a Sidr tree In a dream, seeing a Sidr tree in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Seeing trees cut down in a dream is evidence of severing kinship ties or dissolving the marital relationship. Also, dreaming of cutting down many quarrels in a dream indicates doomed promises. Cutting down many trees in a dream is a sign of committing sins. And disobedience to parents. A man’s dream of cutting down a tree is evidence of the death of his wife. Seeing a cut down tree in a mosque is evidence of the death of a famous person. Seeing a palm in a dream indicates the death of a man of high status. Dreaming of a tree in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of the existence of a good and righteous man. He will be her partner in the future. A green tree full of leaves is evidence of a wealthy couple. An unmarried woman who sees a dry tree inside indicates bad luck and failure in her life. A single woman who sees herself picking fruit from the tree, this is evidence of a man’s intense love for her. Woman An unmarried woman who sees herself planting a tree in dreams indicates that she will live in a year full of surprises and happy news. An unmarried woman watering trees as a mother is evidence of the emotional stability she possesses. Water in a dream in general indicates safety in reality. Sidr tree: an honest man, Gracious, generous, virtuous, fruitful according to the tree and the virtue of its fruit. Interpretation of a dream about a tree by Ibn SirinSeeing a tree in a dream is a dream as interpreted by Ibn Sirin, it shows blessings from God Almighty. Also, sitting under a tree in a dream is a sign of God’s satisfaction. If he sees The dreamer himself plants a tree in a dream, this means that he will give birth to a child. As for the dreamer who sees himself reaping fruits other than the fruits that bear fruit on the tree, this indicates that he took money unlawfully. As for the one who dreams of the presence of many trees in the dream, this is a sign of That he will become a leader. The tree in the house is evidence that there is a fire in the house, which will burn the dreamer. The tree in the house is a sign of trouble among the people of the house. The green tree symbolizes good work. Interpretation of a dream about cutting down a tree.

Sidr tree: an honest man, Gracious, generous, virtuous, fruitful according to the tree and the virtue of its fruit. Also, sitting under a tree in a dream is a sign of God’s satisfaction. If he sees The dreamer himself plants a tree in a dream, this means that he will give birth to a child. As for the dreamer who sees himself reaping fruits other than the fruits that bear fruit on the tree, this indicates that he took money unlawfully. As for the one who dreams of the presence of many trees in the dream, this is a sign of That he will become a leader. The tree in the house is evidence that there is a fire in the house, which will burn the dreamer. The tree in the house is a sign of trouble among the people of the house. The green tree symbolizes good work. Interpretation of a dream about cutting down a tree.
